scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:ropsten: mustache config/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:sepolia: mustache config/sepolia.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:mumbai: mustache config/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:matic: mustache config/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npx graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/mana-ethereum-mainnet
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run prepare:ropsten && npx graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/mana-ethereum-ropsten
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run prepare:goerli && npx graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/mana-ethereum-goerli
scripts.deploy:sepolia: npm run prepare:sepolia && npx graph deploy --studio mana-ethereum-sepolia
scripts.deploy:mumbai: npm run prepare:mumbai && npx graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ decentraland/mana-matic-mumbai
scripts.deploy:matic: npm run prepare:matic && npx graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ decentraland/mana-matic-mainnet
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:sepolia && npm run deploy:goerli && npm run deploy:ropsten && npm run deploy:mainnet && npm run deploy:mumbai npm run deploy:matic
